name: Air Rescue 3D
description:
Air Rescue Game 3D takes you on a flying adventure through the city skyline and Sea in this helicopter flying simulation game. Become the best helicopter rescue pilot and save stranded people , making your way to the designated land point where you must land the helicopter to complete each of the exciting levels in this helicopter flight simulation game. 

Features :
- Realistic flying simulation
- Realistic flight physics
- High quality chopper
- High quality graphics
- Easy to play driving controls.
- Radar system, etc
